content: these pot holders feature a simple stranded colorwork design worked in the round on one set of 32 circular needles the strands carried along the round on the interior of the pot holder provide even more protection for your hands as you bake cookies or grab pot handles *note* pattern updated 1/14/14 with changes to the cast on and finishing instructions designer knit picks design team pattern type knit sizes included 7 wide x 6 75 tall yarn suggested dishie multi yarn dishie yarn simply cotton organic worsted yarn yardage 380 needles/hooks suggested size 5 3 75mm 32 circular needle fiber type cotton & blends weight worsted/hvy worsted
